class AbstractContextualMAB[source]

AbstractContextualMAB(theta, noise, linear=False)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
a = AbstractContextualMAB(theta = [0.1,0.9], noise=0, linear = False)
a.activation(9)

0.9998766054240137
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
b = AbstractContextualMAB(theta= [0.1,0.9], noise=0, linear = True)
b.activation(9)

9
